inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
    and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
    and (requestUri_s startswith "/ecommerce/io-outcomes/v1/transactions/")
    and (requestQuery_s contains "outcome")
| summarize req=count() by replace("&walletId", "", tostring(split(requestQuery_s, "=")[1])), Time=bin(TimeGenerated,15m)
| render barchart with (kind=unstacked)

content.Query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
    and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
    and (requestUri_s startswith "/ecommerce/io-outcomes/v1/transactions/")
    and (requestQuery_s contains "outcome")
| summarize req=count() by tostring(split(requestQuery_s, "=")[1]), Time=bin(TimeGenerated,15m)
| render columnchart with (kind=unstacked)

content.content:
- `0` - Success 
- `1` - Generic error 
- `2` - Authorization error 
- `3` - Invalid data 
- `4` - Timeout 
- `5` - Unsupported circuit 
- `6` - Missing data 
- `7` - Invalid card: expired card etc 
- `8` - Canceled by the user 
- `9` - Double transaction 
- `10` - Excessive amount 
- `11` - Order not present 
- `12` - Invalid method 
- `13` - Retriable KO 
- `14` - Invalid session
- `17` - Taken in charge
- `25` - PSP Error
- `99` - Backend KO
- `116` - Balance not available
- `117` - CVV Error
- `121` - Limit exceeded
content.title: Outcome Codes

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 0.8;
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "ecommerce/io/v2/payment-requests/[^/]+"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=count(httpStatus_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

content.Query:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 0.8;
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "ecommerce/io/v2/payment-requests/[^/]+" and httpMethod_s == "GET"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=count(httpStatus_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_url = "ecommerce/io/v2/payment-requests/[^/]+";
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex api_url
| extend HTTPStatus = case(
  httpStatus_d between (100 .. 199), "1XX",
  httpStatus_d between (200 .. 299), "2XX",
  httpStatus_d between (300 .. 399), "3XX",
  httpStatus_d between (400 .. 499), "4XX",
  "5XX")
| summarize count() by HTTPStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render areachart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "count")

content.Query:
let api_url = "ecommerce/io/v2/payment-requests/[^/]+";
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex api_url and httpMethod_s == "GET"
| extend HTTPStatus = tostring(toint(httpStatus_d))
| summarize count() by HTTPStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render areachart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "count")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 3;
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "ecommerce/io/v2/payment-requests/[^/]+"
| summarize
    watermark=threshold,
    duration_percentile_95=percentiles(timeTaken_d, 95) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "response time(s)")

| where requestUri_s matches regex "ecommerce/webview/v1/payment-methods/[^/]+/sessions" and httpMethod_s == "POST"
| summarize
    watermark=threshold,
    duration_percentile_95=percentiles(timeTaken_d*1000, 95) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "response time(ms)")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_hosts = datatable (name: string) ["api.platform.pagopa.it"];
let threshold = 0.95;
AzureDiagnostics
| where originalHost_s in (api_hosts)
| where requestUri_s matches regex "ecommerce/io/v2/transactions/[^/]+/auth-requests"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=count(httpStatus_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
    and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
    and (requestUri_s startswith "/ecommerce/io-outcomes/v1/transactions/")
    and (requestQuery_s contains "outcome")

content.PartSubTitle: This is the outcome returned to IO app associated to the guest card payment session creation on NPG
content.PartTitle: Payment with contextual onboarding - NPG session outcome
content.Query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
    and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
    and (requestUri_s startswith "/ecommerce/io-outcomes/v1/payments/cards/outcomes")
    and (requestQuery_s contains "outcome")
| extend outcome = tostring(parse_urlquery(requestQuery_s)["Query Parameters"]["outcome"])
| summarize req=count() by outcome, Time=bin(TimeGenerated,15m)
| render columnchart with (kind=unstacked)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
    and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
    and (requestUri_s startswith "/ecommerce/io-outcomes/v1/transactions/")
    and (requestQuery_s contains "outcome")
| summarize req=count() by replace("&walletId", "", tostring(split(requestQuery_s, "=")[1])), Time=bin(TimeGenerated,15m)
| render barchart with (kind=unstacked)

content.Query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
    and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
    and (requestUri_s startswith "/payment-wallet-outcomes/v1/wallets/contextual-onboard/outcomes")
    and (requestQuery_s contains "outcome")
| extend outcome = tostring(parse_urlquery(requestQuery_s)["Query Parameters"]["outcome"])
| summarize req=count() by outcome, Time=bin(TimeGenerated,15m)
| render columnchart with (kind=unstacked)
content.PartTitle: Payment with contextual onboarding - create transaction wallet outcome
content.PartSubTitle: This is the outcome returned to IO app associated to the transaction wallet creation process
